name: Babel - Stack Tower (Ad Free)
description:
Swipe to match the bottom symbol of the falling cube to the one on the cube below!

Babel - Stack Tower is a simple & beautiful tower builder game.

Features:
- Simple controls
- Addictive gameplay
- Relaxing soundtrack
- 8 levels to unlock
- Mindful gameplay

How to play game:
- Swipe Left, Right, Down or Up to rotate the cube
- Match the symbol on the bottom of the falling cube to the symbol of the cube below
- Gain points with each match and bring back the colors to your world
- Unlock new levels and conquer the leaderboard


Enjoy your game!
